page.title: 13SOCIAL EVENTS FOR CLUNTON
page.content: As well as the clubs there are regular social events in the immediate and surroundings areas. Discos, Barn Dances and Dinners are advertised regularly in Clunton Notice Board and on prominent trees around the Parish. Coffee mornings are popular places for a get together and a number are held throughout the year in aid of charitable causes. Regular events include Clunton Bazaar, Purslow Show and a coffee morning in the Crown Inn in aid of the church. The Crown Inn is an important meeting place, particularly for the men. It also lays on suppers after the Harvest Festival and the Carol Service. It is a good place to be on New Year's Eve when fancy dress is the order of the day.
